modName: Teldryn Sero A Truly Powerful Warrior of Morrowind
summary: Teldren Sero Has Know become a God And Worthy Of His Statements he Clams. His New Powers Include More Powerful Spells, Perks, Shouts .
descriptionHtml:
Teldryn Sero Is A True God And Has Learned The Way Of The Voice He Also Now Essential and Far More PowerFul. For Now Only His Abilities Have Changed if you want his Armor Let Me know Feedback would be great i am new to this My First Mod :D

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60325-3-1417120508.jpg[/img]
Also He Can be found still At the Retching Netch. Duh
P.S Be Warned He is On Lvl 150 Very powerful

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60325-1-1417196898.jpg[/img]
Dragons Fear Him...





[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60325-2-1417171301.jpg[/img]
He Shows No Mercy.........And Feels No Fear

Dragonborn required


Also If you Want A Follower That fits your play style Leave a Comment :)Â
author: XMarioAscended
